title: possible dark wind bug
body:
> Dark Wind can bounce up to 5 times and will prioritize enemies it has not yet hit

so i was doing {{champion:9}} {{summoner:3}} which ive been binging, and we were up against a vayne and bard and i swear darkwind was bugging after the first time i landed it on vayne. id throw darkwind down to the caster minions and by the third/4th minion which vayne was standing right next to and it would just bounce off to another minion for the rest of the laning phase, though it would fly off and hit bard who was in the brush.

its like it registered vayne as already hit unless i casted it directly at her.could you look into this.

replies.body:
Hey
Would you be able to re-create the bug in a custom game and upload it? This is too make sure it wasn't just a one time glitch or anything and so Riot can take a good look at what is going on. Thanks and have a good day!

Yours sincerely,
Talwyn
Well since i posted this it has happened twice,both times missing the person in the adc role, so i could give it a go
